page.title: 13RECREATION AT THRYBERGH
page.content: The{youth club}is situated in the grounds of the {Comprehensive {School.}In school hours it is used as part of the school, but at night it is for the{local children}and most of them meet there. There are lots of things to do: pool tables, snooker, table football and space invaders. There is a big screen TV for those who want to{relax}and a bar where{soft {drinks}and{food}can be bought. The {sports hall}has squash courts and a {big hall}where activities such as tennis, netball, badminton and basketball take place. These are used by the school by day and the public in the evening. On Saturday afternoon there are{roller disco sessions.}Those who do not want to take part can watch from the balcony or buy themselves {refreshments}in the{cafe. }
